712590.name: Digital Sound Factory - Orchestral Stacks
712590.description:
The Digital Sound Factory - Orchestral Stacks is a collection of orchestral instruments designed for Cakewalk’s Rapture Pro and Rapture Session virtual instruments. This sound expansion features the Seattle Symphony recorded at the Benaroya Hall and the Bastyr Cathedral. Various size sections and styles were sampled, combined, and programmed to create this ultimate orchestral collection. Utilizing the powerful Rapture synthesizer engine, sound parameters are mapped to real time controls allowing for quick custom edits. Programs include the authentic sounds as well as combination stacks rendering rich luscious sounds. Orchestral textures provide movement that inspires creativity.

Specifications:
2,300 samples (1.87 GB)
Resolution: 48 kHz, 16-bit
Programs: 130 Programs
Compatibility: Rapture Pro, Rapture Session
Instrument Page controls: Filter, Resonance, Tube, FX Amount, Amp Attack, Amp Release EQ, Individual Instrument Volumes, and more
Special features: Professional Orchestra recorded in two different Concert Halls.
